Meteor.Font

Class FontManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Meteor.Font.FontManager

  • public class FontManager
extends java.lang.Object
    FontManager is an font manager class.
    This class can be used to grab and use images.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public static void add(java.lang.String key,
                       Spritesheet bmpFont)
        Method used to add a font to the hash table.
        Parameters:
        key - The lower-cased key attached to the font.
        bmpFont - The font to add to the hash table.

      • get

        public static Spritesheet get(java.lang.String name)
        Method used to grab a font contained inside the hash table.
        Parameters:
        name - The name attached to the font.
        Returns:
        The font from the hash table.

      • remove

        public static void remove(java.lang.String name,
                          boolean isKey)
        Method used to remove a font from the hash table.
        Parameters:
        name - The name attached to the font.
        isKey - Weather or not the name parameter is the key generated by the AssetManager.

      • getDefaultFont

        public static Spritesheet getDefaultFont()
        Returns:
        The default font used by the engine.

      • cleanUp

        public static void cleanUp()
        Method used to clean up memory used by certain processes.
